rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall designed according to Vastu principles with proper alignment and natural lighting.
Modern living room featuring minimalistic design with open space to enhance energy flow as per Vastu guidelines.
Compact yet functional kitchen with efficient layout and ample natural light for auspicious energy.
A space-efficient dining area integrated within the living room to save costs while maintaining design harmony.
Spacious bedroom with an attached balcony ensuring a peaceful atmosphere and proper Vastu alignment.
Functional bathroom designed to optimize space while adhering to Vastu principles of water element management.

openings.description: Main entrance oriented in the north-east as per Vastu to invite positive energy.
Balcony door leading out from the bedroom to the spacious balcony ensuring a good view and ventilation.
Window for natural light in the kitchen to enhance energy flow per Vastu guidelines.

swimming_pool.description: A modestly sized swimming pool integrated into the design for relaxation while considering budget constraints.

irregular_plot_adaptation.description: The layout has been optimized to adapt to an irregular plot, utilizing space efficiently with minimal wastage and cost-effective measures.
